Notes: "It is thus possible that BA44/45 in humans has evolved to cope with more complex sequencing dependencies and those required for language... or to better integrate different cognitive operations, such as the number of items and their sequencing relationships" p. 147

"theta-gamma coupling in the human and monkey auditory cortex in response to speech sounds... [supports] the notion of evolutionarily conserved neural oscillatory processes for speech sounds in auditory cortex" p. 149
